definition: place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish

sentences.english: And the king said unto her, What aileth thee?
sentences.chinese: 王問婦人說，你有什麼苦處。

sentences.english: She decided to level with him about her own sufferings.
sentences.chinese: 她決定坦率地和他講自己的苦處。

sentences.english: You don't know how they suffered as disaster victims.
sentences.chinese: 你可不知道災民的苦處。

sentences.english: If you need a sympathetic ear, I am here.
sentences.chinese: 如果你需要誰傾聽你的苦處，我在這兒呢。

sentences.english: Tibetan fierce, hide, all is troubling land.
Hey, dude, you suffering in where?
sentences.chinese: 哎，夥計，你的苦處在哪裏。

sentences.english: I can only express the hope that my readers will understand my difficult position, and will be indulgent;
sentences.chinese: 我只希望讀者能夠理解我的立場及苦處，多多包涵。

sentences.english: This hardship is easy to think of as a wife in a large family.
sentences.chinese: 在大家庭裏做媳婦，這苦處是不難想到的。

sentences.english: On the way back, we talked about the pleasure of the country people and the pain of the farmers.
sentences.chinese: 在歸途中，我們討論到只在鄉下的快樂和農夫的苦處。

sentences.english: He recited his own sufferings at full length.
sentences.chinese: 他詳盡地敘述了自己的苦處。
